forumNotes.author: ilko
forumNotes.content:
Get WinSetupFromUSB:  
[http://www.datafileh...d-3c7ead6d.html](http://www.datafilehost.com/download-3c7ead6d.html "External link")  

Look at \\files\\MULTIpartitionUSBstick folder.  

There are a few batch files which install and load dummydisk.sys:  
[http://www.codeproje...ct_hooking.aspx](http://www.codeproject.com/KB/system/soviet_direct_hooking.aspx "External link")  

No restart is required upon loading, just need to replug the USB stick if it's already inserted.  
Restart is required for unloading/removing, driver does not support unloading as far as I know.  

Confirmed working with XP and 2003 32 bits versions. A few reports it works on 32 bit 7 too.  
No 64-bits support, I am not aware of 64 bits versions of dummydisk or cfadisk.
